Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கற்றதனால் ஆய பயனென்கொல் வாலறிவன்நற்றாள் தொழாஅர் எனின்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: No fruit have men of all their studied lore, Save they the 'Purely Wise One's' feet adore.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: In the foreground, an aged, proud scholar in an ancient library, his back turned towards a light source. He holds a scroll, his face a mixture of intellectual pride and deep, inner emptiness.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Behind him, towering stacks of palm-leaf manuscripts and scrolls subtly resemble cage bars, symbolizing the confinement of knowledge without wisdom.
Layered_Composition.Background: In the background, a humble devotee kneels in adoration before an ethereal light emanating from a pair of divine feet (the 'Purely Wise One's feet').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A scholar whose vast learning is fruitless because he ignores true wisdom, contrasted with a humble devotee who embraces it.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The light from the divine feet casts a long, dark shadow of the scholar, representing his spiritual ignorance despite his vast learning.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Somber, contemplative, with a sharp contrast between inner emptiness and spiritual fulfillment.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The library is dominated by cool, intellectual blues and greys. The only warmth radiates as a golden, fulfilling glow from the divine feet, a warmth the scholar ignores.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Wide shot, shot on 50mm lens, dramatic chiaroscuro.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with fine details on the manuscripts and faces.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast lighting, strong rim light on the devotee from the divine source, deep shadows emphasizing the scholar's isolation.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Digital painting in the style of Rembrandt, with mystical painterly effects for symbolic aspects.

Negative_Prompt: deformed limbs, text artifacts, oversaturated skin, blurry, modern clothing, East Asian facial features, smiling scholar.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the shadow's shape.
